Package assignment2

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CatHandler
    A simple exception throwing/catching test class This class uses a few inner classes that are descendants of the Exception superclass We use a couple try/catch blocks to ensure the subclass exception will be caught when catching the superclass type ExceptionAlpha.
    DogHandler
    Another exception throwing/catching test class This one contains a checked exception therefore it's declared with the main method Here we are testing that each exception thrown can be handled by catching the superclass type Exception
    FishHandler
    Another example of exception handling In this class we are working with rethrown exceptions A method is declared that by default just throws an exception We then have another method that calls the former method handles its exception, then immediately rethrows the exception.
    OrderHandler
    This class is centered around the importance of the order of catch statements A compilation will occur if your catch statements DO NOT follow the Exception hierarchy The lower in the hierarchy, the farther up the catch chain it should be.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
